professional_summary: Resourceful leader with expertise in customer quality assurance, revenue generation, and cost reduction. Skilled in motivating teams, developing training programs, and implementing process improvements.

key_responsibilities: and hospital personnel on insurance requirements (Medicare/Medicaid) for durable medical equipment.
Participate in corporate projects to increase quality assurance
Develop training programs to improve procedure efficiency and implement them.
Supervise a team of 20 customer service representatives.
Institute best practices to meet quality assurance and client-specific requirements
increasing customer service representative efficiency by 50%.
Represent the school at public events and presentations.
Configure and maintain a new database system for the entire school.
